* Biomass almost has a sparkattack when Perndabot raised the missile 
launcher to his chest, snaking his tenticles back to cover it so that it at 
least had a little protection if they decided to shot.
Nue'e looked, eyes wide at Perndabot, her own spark in her throat and 
standing stark still.  There beings were hostile, and they were supposed to 
mingle with them? This was going to harder then they thought.
But both Biomass and Nue'e relax as Perndabot removes the launched from it's 
location at Biomass's chest, sighing in relief.
Biomass blinked as he listened to Perndabot introduce himself. His gaze 
shifted to the Iron Fist when he gestured to it.
This was the place they were going to stay? How.....wonderful.
Nue'e took a few steps forward and looked even closer at the Iron Fist, her 
view blocked by Perndabot so she moved up and peeked around his body to see 
the base.
It wasn't as nice looking as their ship but she was sure that they had a 
perfect lab.
Biomass kept his eyes on Perndabot until he noticed Swift, looking down at 
her and waving a tenticle at her.*

" Hello."

* But then Biomass looked back towards Perndabot.*

" Our ship just crashed here and you were the closest faction to us. I 
decided to join you, if I can."

" Me too." *came the voice from Nue'e as she looked straight up at Perndabot 
before stepping around him and looking at the Iron Fist.*
